name: The First Step (itch)
description:
Sometimes our live goes beyond our control. And the best thing we can do - choose the first step of the longest journey.

A short relaxing puzzle game where everything is out of control except the first step. This step determines the path you go and can lead you both ways to success or failure. 

  • 15 levels/ approx. 30 min
  • Starts smoothly, continues pretty harshly.
  • Mind-work required.

Made in 44 hours for GMTK jam 2020.
